location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This black and white photograph shows Muscat Town.Inscriptions:To the left of the image, in pen: ‘1. Sultan’s Palace’, ‘2. R.A.F. Rest House & W.T. [Wireless Telegraph] Station’, ‘3. British Political Agency’, and ‘4. Old Portugese Forts, now manned by Local Police’. Blue arrows indicate the position of these features on the photograph.To the right of the image, in pen: ‘Mattra’ and ‘Road Muscat to Mattra’. Blue arrows and red lines indicate the positions of these features on the photograph.
